release.action: Renaming the project because the focus will be on defining a vernacular for localization. Resource bundles are used in this context and are still a part of the package. This initial release contains the same code ppwcode vernacular resourcebundle II v1.4.
New parent pom with non-snapshot version of checkstyle and license header templates.
There is a version 1.3 released, which is not in svn and not tagged!

release.description: new version of ppwcode exception util
release.action: We now only use the split of part in ppwcode exception util, and no longer the exception vernacular. This is only an implementation issue.

release.description: new version of ppwcode exception vernacular
release.action: Via a new parent pom, we use the first non-snapshot release of the ppwcode exception vernacular. Here, there is one class name changed, and we changed this code accordingly. This is only an implementation issue.
Moved project from PeopleWare to ppwcode. Packages thus have new names. This is the natural child of ppw-i18n-I
ResourceBundleLoadStrategy now throws exceptions when the resource bundle is not found, instead of returning null.
